item.title: Shipping ministry bans movement of freight vessels, boats during Eid journeys
item.description: With Eid travels approaching, the Ministry of Shipping has announced a strict 10-day ban on sand-laden freight vessels and small dinghy boats to prevent accidents on inland waterways. Speedboats are prohibited at night, while daytime passengers must wear life jackets, bdnews24.com reports.
